Articles.Content:
Hi guys, not sure if this is the right place for this but I think it is?

Anyway I've been having this issue a lot recently where the CoM icon doesn't show in the SPH no matter how many times I click it. It also doesn't re appear with a reload of the game. Any tips? Could the mods I have installed be having an effect on the situation?

Thanks.
Never mind guys I think I've figured it out, it seems to be a problem caused by B9 Aerospace splitter parts? :/ I'll just try to avoid them I guess.
Wait no, it was with a specific engine for some reason?
B9 in 0.23 is quite buggy. Any other mods?
